title: Champion select keeps getting stuck at zero
body:
Teammate or enemy team is picking or banning and at some stage of this process it runs down to zero and gets stuck there (doesn't move on to next part of champ ban/select). Then depending on how long until it gets to me, I eventually get booted.

Then I have 5 min or 10 min delayed queue. If I play ranked I would probably lose LP. This is ridiculous my internet is fine and 120 mb down.

Edit: Why isn't this fixed yet? I see posts from January on this...

replies.body: It sounds like you're having a network issue that's causing you to lose sync with your group, leaving you behind.  I recommend going over[ connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to strengthen your connection and get this fixed up for good.  Your internet might be fine, but it doesn't mean your connection is!

How can I lose sync when the client barely uses any connection and ping doesn't even matter given the long pick times? I STILL see my teammates talking and they actually see my comments and respond to it. This is already at the point where a ban or pick is stuck at zero on my screen.

The client or process needs to be re-designed if it relies on "syncing with your group" if it's so buggy and causes lost promo series. There should be a different process altogether that doesn't fuck even if the internet is fine and I have 35 ping in-game and I'm downloading nothing AND I have 120 down/20 up.

Aha, actually the client requires a constant connection as soon as you login.  For example, when you enter queue and join champion select you are transitioning from pvp.net to champion select.  Everything intertwines together, so if you have unstable connection then you could get left behind.  Let me know if that clears things up.
